com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLTextures2DType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JCGLTexturesType

    public interface JCGLTextures2DType
    The interface to OpenGL 2D textures.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • texture2DBind

        void texture2DBind(JCGLTextureUnitType unit,
                   JCGLTexture2DUsableType texture)
            throws JCGLException
        Bind the texture texture to the texture unit unit. Any existing bound texture (of any type) is unbound.
        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit
        texture - The texture
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
        See Also:
        JCGLTexturesType.textureUnitUnbind(JCGLTextureUnitType)

      • texture2DDelete

        void texture2DDelete(JCGLTexture2DType texture)
              throws JCGLException
        Deletes the texture referenced by texture.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • texture2DIsBound

        boolean texture2DIsBound(JCGLTextureUnitType unit,
                         JCGLTexture2DUsableType texture)
                  throws JCGLException
        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit
        texture - The texture
        Returns:
        true iff the texture texture is bound to the texture unit unit.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • texture2DIsBoundAnywhere

        boolean texture2DIsBoundAnywhere(JCGLTexture2DUsableType texture)
                          throws JCGLException
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture
        Returns:
        true iff the texture texture is bound to any texture unit.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • texture2DAllocate

        JCGLTexture2DType texture2DAllocate(JCGLTextureUnitType unit,
                                    long width,
                                    long height,
                                    JCGLTextureFormat format,
                                    JCGLTextureWrapS wrap_s,
                                    JCGLTextureWrapT wrap_t,
                                    JCGLTextureFilterMinification min_filter,
                                    JCGLTextureFilterMagnification mag_filter)
                             throws JCGLException

        Allocate a texture of width width and height height of format format, binding it to unit.

        The texture is wrapped around the s axis using the wrapping mode wrap_s, with the OpenGL default being TEXTURE_WRAP_REPEAT.

        The texture is wrapped around the t axis using the wrapping mode wrap_t, with the OpenGL default being TEXTURE_WRAP_REPEAT.

        The texture is scaled down using the minification filter min_filter, with the OpenGL default being TEXURE_FILTER_LINEAR.

        The texture is scaled up using the magnification filter mag_filter, with the OpenGL default being TEXTURE_FILTER_LINEAR.

        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit to which the texture will be initially bound
        width - The width in pixels
        height - The height in pixels
        format - The texture format
        wrap_s - The method with which to wrap textures around the s axis
        wrap_t - The method with which to wrap textures around the t axis
        min_filter - The minification filter
        mag_filter - The magnification filter
        Returns:
        An allocated texture
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • texture2DUpdate

        void texture2DUpdate(JCGLTextureUnitType unit,
                     JCGLTexture2DUpdateType data)
              throws JCGLException

        Replace the contents (or part of the contents) of the texture data.getTexture() with data.

        Updating a texture requires binding and unbinding textures, and the given unit will be used to perform the update, breaking any associated bindings for that unit. The updated texture will remain bound to unit when the function returns.

        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit that will be used to perform the update
        data - The data to upload
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • texture2DGetImage

        ByteBuffer texture2DGetImage(JCGLTextureUnitType unit,
                             JCGLTexture2DUsableType texture)
                      throws JCGLException

        Fetch image data for the given texture.

        Fetching texture data requires binding and unbinding textures, and the given unit will be used to perform the retrieval, breaking any associated bindings for that unit. The texture will remain bound to unit when the function returns.

        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit that will be used to fetch the data
        texture - The texture
        Returns:
        The texture image data associated with texture
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs

      • texture2DRegenerateMipmaps

        void texture2DRegenerateMipmaps(JCGLTextureUnitType unit)
                         throws JCGLException
        Regenerate the mipmaps for the 2D texture bound to the texture unit unit. If the texture does not have mipmaps, the function has no effect.
        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs
